thread.title: Watch Oprah’s first “60 Minutes” appearance from 1986
thread.title_full: Watch Oprah’s first “60 Minutes” appearance from 1986

title: Watch Oprah’s first “60 Minutes” appearance from 1986
text:
By Ned Ehrbar CBS News January 31, 2017, 4:53 PM Watch Oprah’s first “60 Minutes” appearance from 31 years ago Oprah Winfrey becomes special contributor to “60 Minutes” 
It’s hard to imagine a time when Winfrey wasn’t a household name. But her rise to international super-stardom didn’t begin until late in 1986 -- the same year she sat down with Mike Wallace for an interview on “60 Minutes,” her first appearance on the program. 
“Until three months ago, most Americans had never heard of her,” Wallace explains in the video. “Oprah has arrived.” 
With Winfrey now joining “60 Minutes,” the interview offers some fascinating perspective. © 2017 CBS Interactive Inc. All Rights Reserved.
